event.title: Scaling Night
event.description:
Talks on scaling!

- Auto-scaling PHP Applications using Chef and AWS
    Andy Gale, Hello Future

- Scaling at BaseKit
    Ade Slade, BaseKit

- Scaling wild LAMP for managed hosting
    Clément Debiaune, Freelance

BaseKit have kindly offered to sponsor the event again, and have offered their office as the venue, as well as beer and pizza! Don't forget to check them out- and if you're looking, they are hiring.

Afterwards we'll probably go to the pub, somewhere on King Street tends to be the theme.
